desc: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant magic damage and gaining increased attack speed.
notes: Upon casting, many buffs and debuffs will be removed.
cmb:
75/75/75/75
19
lore: The madness and brutality of N'aix makes him a vicious and unrelenting foe in combat.
name: life_stealer_rage

desc: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.
notes:
Does not affect Roshan.
Affects Spell Immune units.
The heal is independent of the damage.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
lore: After escaping from his cell in Devarque, N'aix subsisted on flesh and bones of those unfortunate to cross his path.
name: life_stealer_feast

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
notes:
Open Wounds slows over 8 different steps: 70%/70%/60%/50%/30%/10%/10%/10%, with the slow decreasing one step per second.
Stacks additively with other sources of Lifesteal.
attrib:
LIFE LEECH: 50%
MAX SLOW: 70%
DURATION: 8
CAST RANGE: 200/300/400/500
cmb:
110/110/110/110
24/20/16/12
lore: Fresh wounds and the scent of blood often draw out the scavengers to finish the job.
name: life_stealer_open_wounds

desc: Lifestealer swallows an allied hero, allowing them to hide within him. Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the hero within. When an assimilated hero leaves Lifestealer, they erupt outward, damaging nearby enemies.
cmb:
50
50
lore: How can Lifestealer resist the chance to sample an ally?
name: life_stealer_assimilate

desc: Ejects an Assimilated hero, damaging nearby enemies.
name: life_stealer_assimilate_eject

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack, and when consumed the creep will heal Lifestealer's health equal to the creep's current health. Does not work on enemy Heroes.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
If the infested unit dies before Lifestealer consumes it, no health is gained.
Lifestealer gains experience while under the effects of Infest.
Creeps that are controlled while Infested share Lifestealer's movement speed.
cmb:
50/50/50
100
lore: With this infestation, N'aix consumes the life blood of the host, restoring him back to full unholy power.
name: life_stealer_infest

desc: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out, exploding from within.
name: life_stealer_consume

desc: Lifestealer seizes control of the host body's nervous system, allowing him to issue movement and attack orders from within.  Controlled units share Lifestealer's movement speed.  Cannot be used on heroes.
name: life_stealer_control
